root.name: Namco Museum: Virtual Arcade
root.description: The disc is a compilation of the following games:Xbox Live Arcade Games Dig Dug (1982) Galaga (1981) Galaga Legions (2008) Mr. Driller Online (2008) Ms. Pac-Man (1981) New Rally-X (1981) Pac-Man (1980) Pac-Man Championship Edition (2007) Xevious (1982) Museum Games Baraduke (1985) Bosconian (1981) Dig Dug II (1985) Dragon Buster (1984) Dragon Spirit (1987) Galaga '88 (1987) Galaxian (1979) Grobda (1984) King Balloon (1980) Mappy (1983) Metro-Cross (1985) Motos (1985) Pac Pal (1983) Pac-Mania (1987) Pole Position (1982) Pole Position II (1983) Rally-X (1980) Rolling Thunder (1986) Sky Kid (1985)Sky Kid Deluxe (1986) Super Pac-Man (1982) The Tower of Druaga (1984) Arrangement Games Dig Dug Arrangement (2005)Galaga Arrangement (2005)Pac-Man Arrangement (2005)
